Question: This person was hired full-time in 1977 and worked a four-hour midday shift, six days per week on a $96 weekly salary.
Hints: The new contract allowed this person to work a reduced schedule from four to three-day working weeks.
In June 1969, the family moved to nearby Rockville Centre and this person transferred to South Side High School.
This person hosted his final broadcast on terrestrial airwaves on December 16, 2005.
